item.title: Need help with wielding!-Also PlayerRights 3

item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:4, topic:168592”][quote author=Hockey4lifexx link=topic=228200.msg1959139#msg1959139 date=1198895730]
playerrights <=2

should be == 2 i beilive
[/quote]

He doesn’t want anyone with lower rights than 2 to weild it. So

its:

if(playerRights < 2) {[/quote]
Thanks, I got no errors, I don’t know if it works because client.Silabsoft.org and my silab client wont load. Thanks though![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2007, 03:40:41 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:6, topic:168592”]As for your second problem, you don’t see the crown, but other people do, so it’s alright.[/quote]

item.title: Need help with wielding!-Also PlayerRights 3
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Or just do.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && playerRights <= 1) {
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 1);
sendMessage(“Only admins can use a Granite Maul!”);
}

(Changed to <= 1)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with wielding!-Also PlayerRights 3
item.dc:creator: @PLAYTIME PLAYTIME
item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

ok, well I want to make it so the bugs and glitches in SilabSoft V4 or 5 or watever only admins can weild those items.
This is my G-Maul code

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && playerRights <= 2) { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 1); sendMessage("Only admins can use a Granite Maul!"); }
Ok, then i compile save into game and start playing, so then I weild a g-maul , im owner so im #3, and then it Starts spamming me saying Only admins can use a Granite Maul! and it will keep saying that and saying that… anyway way I can fix that?
My 2nd question is…
When I make myself a PlayerRights 3 im not a admin, anyway to fix that? Also is there a way so your crown appears where you type?
Thanks!

Read full topic
